pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, September 30, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will participate in the High-Level Virtual Event: Tackling COVID-19 together through the ACT-Accelerator on the margins of the United Nations General Assembly. The virtual event will be livestreamed from 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. at http://webtv.un.org/.

The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the United Nations Summit on Biodiversity. The virtual event will be livestreamed from 9:00 a.m. at http://webtv.un.org/.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister attend Question Period.
